extends ViewDef

      • TableDef

        public TableDef(java.lang.String name)

        Create an empty TableDef.

        Parameters:
        name - String TableDef name

      • TableDef

        public TableDef(java.lang.String name,
                ColumnDef... columnDefs)

        Create TableDef and add the given columns.

        If one or more ColumnDefs are defined as belonging to the primary key, then the primary key of this TableDef will be automatically set.
        Parameters:
        name - String TableDef name
        columnDefs - ColumnDef…

      • TableDef

        public TableDef(java.lang.String name,
                java.util.Collection<ColumnDef> columnDefs)

        Create TableDef and add the given columns.

        If one or more ColumnDefs are defined as belonging to the primary key, then the primary key of this TableDef will be automatically set.
        Parameters:
        name - String TableDef name
        columnDefs - Collection<ColumnDef>

        public TableDef(TableDef source)

        Create TableDef by cloning another one.

        Parameters:

                                java.lang.String columnName,

        Add a column which belongs to the primary key.

        Parameters:
        columnFamilyName - String. Optional. Maybe null or empty String.
        columnName - String
        columnType - int from java.sql.Types
        maxLength - int

      • addPrimaryKeyColumn

        public void addPrimaryKeyColumn(java.lang.String columnFamilyName,
                                java.lang.String columnName,
                                int columnType)

        Add a column which belongs to the primary key.

        The column precision will be automatically set by calling ColumnDef.getDefaultPrecision()
        Parameters:
        columnFamilyName - String. Optional. Maybe null or empty String.
        columnName - String
        columnType - int from java.sql.Types

      • autoSetPrimaryKey

        public void autoSetPrimaryKey()
        Walk the list of columns of this TableDef and auto-generate the corresponding PrimaryKeyMetadata.

      • getCreationTimestampColumnName

        public java.lang.String getCreationTimestampColumnName()

        Get the name of the column which will never be modified by update writes of a Record.

        Returns:
        String Column Name or null if no column in the Record is prevented from being modified upon update.

      • setCreationTimestampColumnName

        public void setCreationTimestampColumnName(java.lang.String columnName)

        If not null the value held in this column must not be modified when a Record is updated.

        It is up to the implementation of the DataSource and its child object to implement the behavior.
        Parameters:
        columnName - String Column Name or null if no column in the Record must be prevented from being modified on update.

      • toJdoXml

        public java.lang.String toJdoXml()
        Get representation of this TableDef as a JDO XML class
        Returns:
        String of the form
        <class name="class_name" table="table_name" /> … </class>
